ygData.subject: do the rythms resistances even work?
ygData.msgSnippet: i was in permafrost last night, juggling guardian and elemental with a drum, along with a magic resist booster from an enchanter. having all three going at the
ygData.messageBody:
i was in permafrost last night, juggling guardian and elemental with a
drum, along with a magic resist booster from an enchanter. having all
three going at the same time (and a ruined bone fork) boosted my magic
resistance to 111 (!), yet i was still unable to resist a single spell
from an evoker who conned white to me (out of about 12 spells). as noted
in the new 2.0 song guide, the spell shield seems to be non-existant. as a
result of my experience i can't even think why i should bother with magic
resistance at all, since i got ripped to shreds by force strike twice.

klamot - bard of fennin ro
